meanings.definition: The practice or art of making videos.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys learning about different videographies in her film class.
meanings.sent2: The videographies created by the students were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The videographies at the film festival made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her videographies were like colorful paintings come to life.
meanings.sent5: The videographies captured the beauty of nature in a unique way.

meanings.definition: A collection or body of videos.
meanings.sent1: The videographies on his channel cover a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent2: She organized her videographies into different playlists.
meanings.sent3: The videographies on the hard drive seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: His videographies were a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The videographies showcased the talent of many young filmmakers.

meanings.definition: The study or analysis of videos.
meanings.sent1: Her research focused on the cultural impact of videographies.
meanings.sent2: They spent hours discussing the videographies from the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for videographies was contagious.
meanings.sent4: In her thesis, she delved deep into the world of videographies.
meanings.sent5: The videographies revealed hidden patterns when analyzed closely.
